description: A professional who utilizes analytical, statistical, and programming skills to collect, analyze, and interpret large datasets to derive actionable insights for business decision-making.

learning_path.description: Setup Backstage.io to catalog services and docs.

learning_path.title: Infrastructure Composability
learning_path.description: Use Crossplane or Terraform to create abstractions for devs.

learning_path.title: DevEx Strategy
learning_path.description: Treat the platform as a product; gather metrics and feedback.

description: Acts as a bridge between a company and its developer community, creating content, giving talks, and gathering feedback to improve the product.

learning_path.title: Technical Foundation
learning_path.description: Ensure coding proficiency to build demos and read community code.

learning_path.title: Content Creation
learning_path.description: Start a technical blog, write tutorials, and record screencasts.

learning_path.title: Public Speaking
learning_path.description: Submit CFPs (Call for Papers) and speak at local meetups.

learning_path.title: Community Building
learning_path.description: Engage on StackOverflow, Discord, and GitHub issues.

learning_path.title: DevRel Metrics
learning_path.description: Learn to track reach, engagement, and product feedback impact.

description: Dissects malicious software to understand how it works, what it does, and how to detect and stop it.

learning_path.title: Low-Level Fundamentals
learning_path.description: Learn Assembly language, registers, stacks, and memory management.

learning_path.title: Static Analysis
learning_path.description: Analyze malware code without running it using disassemblers like Ghidra.

learning_path.title: Dynamic Analysis
learning_path.description: Run malware in a secure sandbox and monitor behavior/network traffic.

learning_path.title: Deobfuscation
learning_path.description: Learn to unpack packed malware and defeat anti-debugging techniques.

learning_path.title: Threat Intel & Reporting
learning_path.description: Create IOCs (Indicators of Compromise) and write analysis reports.

recommended_projects: Set up a Safe Malware Lab

description: Combines Machine Learning, DevOps, and Data Engineering to deploy, maintain, and monitor ML models in production efficiently.

learning_path.title: ML & DevOps Foundation
learning_path.description: Understand ML lifecycles and DevOps principles (Git, CI/CD).

learning_path.title: Model Packaging
learning_path.description: Containerize models using Docker and expose them via REST APIs.

learning_path.title: Pipeline Automation
learning_path.description: Automate training and deployment using Airflow or Kubeflow.

learning_path.title: Monitoring & Drift
learning_path.description: Implement tools to detect data drift and model degradation.

learning_path.title: Scaling & Serving
learning_path.description: Deploy to Kubernetes and manage scalable inference endpoints.

description: Manages digital identities and access to resources, ensuring the right people have the right access at the right time.

learning_path.title: Directory Services
learning_path.description: Master Active Directory, LDAP structure, and User Lifecycle Management.

learning_path.title: Authentication Protocols
learning_path.description: Deep dive into Kerberos, SAML, OAuth2, and OIDC.

learning_path.title: Cloud Identity
learning_path.description: Configure Azure AD or AWS IAM policies, roles, and federation.

learning_path.title: Access Governance
learning_path.description: Implement recertification campaigns and Least Privilege access.

learning_path.title: Privileged Access Management
learning_path.description: Secure high-value accounts using PAM tools like CyberArk.

recommended_projects: Implement RBAC in a Cloud App

description: Ensures software applications meet performance requirements by testing, analyzing, and optimizing code and infrastructure.

learning_path.title: Performance Fundamentals
learning_path.description: Understand latency, throughput, concurrency, and bottlenecks.

learning_path.title: Scripting & Tools
learning_path.description: Create load test scripts using JMeter, K6, or Gatling.

learning_path.title: Execution & Analysis
learning_path.description: Run load/stress tests and analyze results to find breaking points.

learning_path.title: Monitoring & Tuning
learning_path.description: Use APM tools to profile code, queries, and server resources.

learning_path.title: Continuous Performance
learning_path.description: Integrate performance checks into DevOps pipelines.

description: Ensures websites and applications are usable by people with disabilities, complying with legal standards like WCAG and ADA.

learning_path.title: Disability Awareness
learning_path.description: Understand different types of disabilities and how they affect web use.

learning_path.title: Standards & Law
learning_path.description: Master WCAG 2.1/2.2 principles (POUR) and ADA/Section 508.

learning_path.title: Technical Implementation
learning_path.description: Write semantic HTML, manage focus with JS, and use ARIA correctly.

learning_path.title: Testing & Auditing
learning_path.description: Perform manual testing with screen readers and keyboard navigation.

learning_path.title: Remediation
learning_path.description: Learn to fix inaccessible code in legacy applications.

recommended_projects: Accessibility Audit of a Major Site

description: Manages teams of software engineers, focusing on people management, delivery, and technical strategy rather than individual contribution.

learning_path.title: Transition to Leadership
learning_path.description: Shift mindset from coding to enabling others (Servant Leadership).

learning_path.title: People Management
learning_path.description: Master 1-on-1s, performance reviews, coaching, and firing.

learning_path.title: Delivery Management
learning_path.description: Manage agile processes, unblock teams, and predictable delivery.

learning_path.title: Hiring & Culture
learning_path.description: Design interview loops and foster psychological safety.

learning_path.title: Technical Strategy
learning_path.description: Balance roadmap features with technical debt and architectural runway.

description: Executive executive responsible for the overarching technology strategy, R&D, and engineering direction of an organization.

learning_path.title: Executive Leadership
learning_path.description: Learn to manage managers, organizational design, and culture.

learning_path.title: Business Alignment
learning_path.description: Align tech goals with business revenue, growth, and market needs.

learning_path.title: Financial Acumen
learning_path.description: Master P&L management, Capex vs Opex, and forecasting.

learning_path.title: Strategic Architecture
learning_path.description: Make high-level buy vs build decisions and stack selection.

learning_path.title: Risk & Compliance
learning_path.description: Oversee enterprise risk, security posture, and legal compliance.

recommended_projects: Present to a Board of Directors

description: Designs the user flow, logic, and personality of chatbots and voice assistants to ensure natural and effective human-computer interaction.

learning_path.title: Fundamentals of Conversation
learning_path.description: Learn Grice's Maxims, turn-taking, and persona design.

learning_path.title: Scriptwriting & Flow
learning_path.description: Design happy paths and error repair flows for chat/voice.

learning_path.title: Platform Implementation
learning_path.description: Build bots using Dialogflow or Voiceflow, understanding intents/entities.

learning_path.title: Testing & Tuning
learning_path.description: Conduct Wizard of Oz testing and analyze logs to improve NLU.

learning_path.title: Advanced VUI
learning_path.description: Design for voice-specific challenges like lack of visual cues.

description: Combines finance, business, and engineering to optimize cloud spending and cultivate a culture of financial accountability in cloud usage.

learning_path.title: Cloud Fundamentals
learning_path.description: Understand cloud services (Compute, Storage) and how they charge.

learning_path.title: FinOps Principles
learning_path.description: Learn the FinOps lifecycle: Inform, Optimize, Operate.

learning_path.title: Cost Analysis & Tagging
learning_path.description: Master allocation strategies, resource tagging, and showback reports.

learning_path.title: Optimization Strategies
learning_path.description: Learn Rightsizing, Reserved Instances, Savings Plans, and Spot instances.

learning_path.title: Governance
learning_path.description: Establish budgets, anomaly detection alerts, and policies.

recommended_projects: Savings Plan Strategy for an Org

description: Applies data science and computational techniques to analyze biological data, such as genetic sequences, aiding in research and healthcare.

learning_path.title: Biological Foundations
learning_path.description: Review DNA, RNA, protein synthesis, and sequencing technologies.

learning_path.title: Programming for Bio
learning_path.description: Learn Python (Biopython) or R (Bioconductor) for sequence manipulation.

learning_path.title: Sequence Analysis
learning_path.description: Perform alignment, variant calling, and gene expression analysis.

learning_path.title: Statistical Genomics
learning_path.description: Apply statistical tests to identify significant biological markers.

learning_path.title: Pipelines & Reproducibility
learning_path.description: Build reproducible workflows using Nextflow or Snakemake.

description: Builds software applications using visual development interfaces instead of writing code, enabling rapid deployment and prototyping.

learning_path.title: Database Logic
learning_path.description: Understand relational data structures using Airtable or Bubble DB.

learning_path.title: Visual Development
learning_path.description: Master building UIs and logic in tools like Bubble or FlutterFlow.

learning_path.title: Automation
learning_path.description: Connect disparate apps using Zapier or Make to automate workflows.

learning_path.title: API Integrations
learning_path.description: Learn to consume external APIs to extend functionality.

learning_path.title: Frontend Polish
learning_path.description: Learn design principles and basic CSS to make apps look professional.

description: Combines network engineering with programming to automate the configuration, management, and testing of network devices.

learning_path.title: Python for Networking
learning_path.description: Master Python basics and libraries like Netmiko and Paramiko.

learning_path.title: Configuration Management
learning_path.description: Deep dive into Ansible playbooks for network devices.

learning_path.title: Programmability APIs
learning_path.description: Learn RESTCONF, NETCONF, and YANG data models.

learning_path.title: Data Structures
learning_path.description: Master structured data handling with JSON, XML, and YAML.

learning_path.title: NetDevOps
learning_path.description: Build CI/CD pipelines to test and deploy network configs.

description: Develops applications for mixed reality headsets like Apple Vision Pro or HoloLens, blending digital content with the physical world.

learning_path.title: Spatial Fundamentals
learning_path.description: Understand 3D space, anchors, and human interface guidelines for MR.

learning_path.title: Apple Ecosystem (VisionOS)
learning_path.description: Learn SwiftUI, RealityKit, and ARKit for Vision Pro dev.

learning_path.title: Cross-Platform (Unity)
learning_path.description: Use Unity's XR stack to build for Meta Quest and Apple Vision.

learning_path.title: Interaction Models
learning_path.description: Implement gesture control, gaze detection, and voice commands.

learning_path.title: Shared Experiences
learning_path.description: Build multi-user spatial apps using networking.

description: Helps organizations select, implement, and optimize Enterprise Resource Planning software (like SAP, Oracle, NetSuite).

learning_path.title: Business Processes
learning_path.description: Understand core business functions: Finance, HR, Supply Chain, and Sales.

learning_path.title: Platform Specialization
learning_path.description: Get certified in a specific ERP (e.g., SAP FI/CO or NetSuite).

learning_path.title: Implementation Lifecycle
learning_path.description: Learn phases: Discovery, Design, Configure, Test, Deploy.

learning_path.title: Data & Reporting
learning_path.description: Migrate legacy data and build reports for stakeholders.

learning_path.title: Consulting Skills
learning_path.description: Master requirement gathering workshops and user training.

description: Develops algorithms and software for quantum computers, bridging the gap between quantum physics theory and practical application.

learning_path.title: Mathematics Foundation
learning_path.description: Master Complex Numbers, Linear Algebra, and Probability.

learning_path.title: Quantum Physics Basics
learning_path.description: Understand qubits, superposition, entanglement, and interference.

learning_path.title: Quantum Programming
learning_path.description: Learn Qiskit or Cirq to write circuits and run on simulators.

learning_path.title: Algorithms
learning_path.description: Implement Shor's, Grover's, and VQE algorithms.

learning_path.title: Hybrid Computing
learning_path.description: Combine classical and quantum computing using Variational algorithms.

description: A data-driven marketing role focused on managing paid advertising campaigns to drive specific user actions like clicks, leads, or sales.

learning_path.title: Digital Marketing Basics
learning_path.description: Understand funnels, CAC, ROAS, LTV, and KPIs.

learning_path.title: Search Engine Marketing
learning_path.description: Master Google Ads search, display, and shopping campaigns.

learning_path.title: Social Advertising
learning_path.description: Learn targeting and creative strategies for Facebook/Instagram/LinkedIn.

learning_path.title: Analytics & Tracking
learning_path.description: Configure GTM, set up conversion events, and analyze GA4 reports.

learning_path.title: Optimization Strategy
learning_path.description: Learn bid strategies, landing page testing, and budget scaling.

description: Executive responsible for the management, implementation, and usability of information and computer technologies within an organization.

learning_path.title: IT Operations Management
learning_path.description: Manage infrastructure, support, and service delivery (ITIL).

learning_path.title: Strategic Alignment
learning_path.description: Learn to map IT capabilities to business goals and revenue.

learning_path.title: Finance for Executives
learning_path.description: Master budgeting, ROI analysis, and cost optimization.

learning_path.title: Leadership & Culture
learning_path.description: Build high-performing teams and manage organizational change.

learning_path.title: Innovation Management
learning_path.description: Evaluate emerging tech (AI, Blockchain) for business advantage.
